values: 皮肤；（动物的）毛皮；（水果或蔬菜的）果皮；外壳；覆盖物；皮制容器；皮囊；薄层；鼓面；[计]个性化界面；界面主题；<俚>钱包；卷烟纸；烟草的烟叶；避孕套；光头；鼓；（斯金牌戏）一种戏剧表演形式；家伙；人；骗子；吝啬鬼；色情文学作品
剥皮；削皮；使脱落（外层或表皮）；蜕皮；（通过磨擦或撞击）使皮肤受伤；<口>诈骗；骗取（钱财）；<俚>训斥；彻底打败；愈合；长出新皮；覆外壳于；使有外皮；使有外壳；（在游戏中）轻易击败对手；（在比赛中）轻松过球；驱赶（牲口等）
<俚>裸体的；色情的；皮肤的；有关皮肤的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 皮的；皮包骨的；紧身的；小气的
机密情报；内部消息；小道消息
剥皮；给…植皮（skin的过去式和过去分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指大型动物的厚皮，也指没有鞣的牛、马等皮革。
现多指猫、兔等动物软毛皮，也指其它动物的毛皮。
指剩下的或可以剥去的果皮或蔬菜皮。
通常指经过加工的熟皮，可用于制作各种皮革制品。
最常用词，指人的皮肤或动物的皮，也可指水果、植物和种子等的外皮。

word_group.brief_definition: 美貌不过一层皮(指人品比外表更重要)
白皮肤；白皙的皮肤；浅色皮肤
厚脸皮, 不计较面子
使人毛骨悚然, 让人起鸡皮疙瘩

word_group.phrase: by the skin of your teeth

word_group.brief_definition: (要做成某事)方法不止一个, 有的是办法
word_group.phrase: there's more than one way to skin a cat

bilingual.source: He puts skin and clothes on the skeleton.
bilingual.target: 他给骨架穿上皮肤和衣服。

bilingual.source: The Javan rhino has skin that looks like armour.
bilingual.target: 爪哇犀牛的皮肤看起来像盔甲。

bilingual.source: The skeleton is then covered in skin and clothes.
bilingual.target: 然后骨架被覆盖上皮肤和衣服。

bilingual.source: She still has smooth skin and straight black hair.
bilingual.target: 她依然有光滑的皮肤和直黑的头发。

bilingual.source: I still have light skin and black hair, of course.
bilingual.target: 当然，我仍然有白皙的皮肤和黑色的头发。

bilingual.source: Its unique feature is the bright red skin on the top of its head.
bilingual.target: 它的独特特征是头顶上的鲜红色皮肤。

bilingual.source: When Jon moves the skeleton, the skin and clothes move with it.
bilingual.target: 当乔恩移动骨架时，皮肤和衣服也会跟着动。

bilingual.source: When he splashed water on his skin, the hot sun soon dried it up.
bilingual.target: 当他把水泼在皮肤上时，烈日很快就把它晒干了。

bilingual.source: Skin care is important for maintaining healthy skin.
bilingual.target: 护肤对保持皮肤健康很重要。

list.abstract: 《Skin》是由盖·纳蒂弗执导，乔纳森·塔克、杰克逊·罗伯特·斯科特、丹妮尔·麦克唐纳等主演，沙龙·迈蒙、盖·纳蒂弗担任编剧的一部剧情短片，于2018年8月14日在好莱坞短片电影节上映。 该片讲述了在美国小镇一家超市的付款通道中，一个黑人对一个10岁白人小孩（杰克逊·罗伯特·斯科特 饰）微笑，不曾想，这个善意的举动受到误解，引发了帮派之间的对抗的故事。 2019年2月，该片获得第91届奥斯卡金像奖最佳真人短片奖；2020年，该片获得柏林电影节最佳短片提名。
《skin》是歌手麦当娜的一张专辑，发行于1998年。

yingyinNormal.en: Howie, the estrogen's getting absorbed by your skin.
yingyinNormal.zh: Howie，雌激素被你的皮肤吸收了。

yingyinNormal.en: Having no skin created opportunities for incredible pain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有皮肤需要忍受难以言表的疼痛。

yingyinNormal.en: Cuttlefish have chromatophores that allow the skin to change color.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乌贼体内含有能使皮肤变色的色素体。

yingyinNormal.en: And he sequenced, he took skin cells, healthy skin, and cancerous bone marrow, and he sequenced the whole genomes of both of them, right, in a couple of weeks, no big deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他进行测序，他取了皮肤细胞，健康的皮肤，和癌化的骨髓，他测定两者的所有基因组，区区几周后。

yingyinNormal.en: Well then, let's take a look at this skin abnormality of yours. Come on, have a seat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来看看你的皮肤异常吧，请坐。

yingyinNormal.en: Your earth is a very small part of a very large industry. Feel my skin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地球只是一个大企业体系中的一小部份。摸摸我的皮肤。

yingyinNormal.en: Well what is it? He couldn't even tell me. He said it was just some sort of skin abnormality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是什么？他根本说不出来，他只说是一种皮肤异常。

yingyinNormal.en: He's handsome, he's lanky, he's brilliant, and his skin has that pale, waxy quality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他帅气十足，身材修长，才华横溢，而且他的皮肤苍白无血色。

yingyinNormal.en: How much will it hurt? It's just a tiny skin sample. You saw me do it to myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 会有多疼啊？只是一块小小皮肤样本，你也看过我给自己取样本的样子了。

yingyinNormal.en: Every part of this building, including the skin on your back, is made to keep you here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这栋楼里的一切，包括你背后的皮肤，都是为了把你留在这里而存在。

yingyinNormal.en: And no air-conditioning. You know, your skin would stick to the seats in the summer. It was a coffin on wheels.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还没有空调，大夏天皮肤都要粘到座位上，简直是可移动的棺材。

yingyinNormal.en: In her last desperate moments, Dani scratched Mr. Grant, leaving his skin under her fingernails.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在她最后的绝望时刻，达妮抓伤了格兰特先生，将他的皮肤组织留在了指甲里。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, that time you looked at me. Who didn't? Your skin is like alabaster. Do you even have pores?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你明显意有所指的瞄了我。谁不想瞄你啊，你的皮肤白璧无瑕，感觉根本没毛孔啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Just think how happy you'll be in a few weeks when I've converted our skin cells into functional brain cells.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你就想着几周后当我把我们的皮肤细胞转化为功能性脑细胞时，你会多开心。

yingyinNormal.en: Concealment becomes an art for these octopi, capable of changing the color and structure of their skin to deceive their attackers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些章鱼让隐匿成为了艺术，它们能够变换皮肤颜色和结构来迷惑敌人。

yingyinNormal.en: And you know what Jake says? That women's underwear is actually more comfortable. And he loves the way the silk feels against his skin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克说，事实上女人的内裤更舒服，他喜欢丝质内裤贴在他皮肤上的感觉。

yingyinNormal.en: This is why we can lift heavy objects without breaking our skin, but a tiny needle can make us bleed with just a little poke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是为什么我们能抬起重物却不会伤到皮肤，但一个小小的针头只要轻轻扎一下就能让我们出血。

yingyinNormal.en: After all, the spread of bacteria is more likely to occur with wet skin and rubbing your wet hands on your clothes or touching the bathroom door can often contaminate them even more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 毕竟，在湿皮肤上，细菌容易传播手湿湿的擦在衣服上，或者去握厕所把手，只会使手更脏。

yingyinNormal.en: Beginning to really like how watery this consistency is because it just feels really, just doesn't feel thick underneath my skin which is something I can really appreciate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开始喜欢这个浓度，很湿润，因为感觉起来很…感觉在皮肤下面没有那么稠，我比较喜欢这一点。

yingyinNormal.en: Episodes of sub psychotic rage. Ass. Possible Tourette's. All right. Moles, lesions or other skin conditions. Soup tattoo on right buttock.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是否有以下精神疾病发作史？干。可能患有吐雷氏症。好了，是否有痣斑、 病变或其他皮肤问题？右边屁股纹了个“汤”字。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The French measures, however, rely too much on severe punishment to change a culture that still regards beauty as <highlight>skin</highlight>-deep — and bone-showing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，法国的措施过于依赖严厉的惩罚，以改变一个仍然认为美是肤浅的、露骨的文化。

examination_example.sentence: You live in your <highlight>skin</highlight>, think your own thoughts, have your own values and make your own choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你活在自己的皮肤里，有自己的想法，有自己的价值观，做出自己的选择。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 皮肤; 皮毛; 外壳

word_family.mean: n. 皮肤；皮；外层；覆盖物；光头；鼓；鼓面；色情文学作品；斯金牌戏；外皮；外壳

sense_info_list.zh: 皮肤; 皮毛; 外壳

examination_example.sentence: In Curacao, the well-known liquor of that name is made from the thick outer <highlight>skin</highlight> of a native orange.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在库拉索岛，这种著名的酒是由一种当地橙子的厚厚的外皮制成的。

sense_info_list.en: strip, scrape, or rub off the skin of

examination_example.sentence: This is because they are sometimes hunted for their meat or their <highlight>skin</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是因为它们有时会被猎杀，来获取肉或皮。

examination_example.sentence: Bacteria are carried by various "media", which can include raw food, moist surfaces where bacteria have been left, our hands or <highlight>skin</highlight> and from coughing or sneezing (打喷嚏) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 细菌通过各种“媒介”携带，包括生的食物、留下细菌的潮湿表面、我们的手或皮肤以及咳嗽或打喷嚏。

examination_example.sentence: To illustrate her point that beauty is but <highlight>skin</highlight> deep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了阐明她的观点，美丽只是肤浅的。

sense_info_list.en: strip; scrape; or rub off the skin of

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 瘦得难看的；皮包骨的；紧身的；贴身的；加了脱脂乳的

word_family.mean: n. 皮肤；皮；外层；覆盖物；光头；鼓；鼓面；色情文学作品；斯金牌戏；外皮；外壳

sense_info_list.zh: 皮肤; 皮毛; 外壳

examination_example.sentence: Seconds later, our lizard emerged from its tank with its old <highlight>skin</highlight> flowing behind it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几秒后，蜥蜴从水箱里钻了出来，蜕下的皮在身后漂着。

examination_example.sentence: That's plenty of time for your <highlight>skin</highlight> to absorb a day's worth of Vitamin D.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这段时间足够你的皮肤吸收一天所需的维生素D。

examination_example.sentence: Remove the <highlight>skin</highlight> and place them in plastic bags or containers and freeze.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 剥去皮，放入塑料袋或容器中冷冻。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 绵羊皮；羊皮；乡村舞会；绵羊革

word_family.mean: n. 皮肤；皮；外层；覆盖物；光头；鼓；鼓面；色情文学作品；斯金牌戏；外皮；外壳

sense_info_list.zh: 皮肤; 皮毛; 外壳

examination_example.sentence: Polar bears have black <highlight>skin</highlight> under their fur.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 北极熊的皮毛下面是黑色的皮肤。

examination_example.sentence: We should never judge a person by the color of their <highlight>skin</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们永远不应该以肤色来判断一个人。

examination_example.sentence: Cool temperature can make cucumber's <highlight>skin</highlight> go bad faster
examination_example.sentence_trans: 凉爽的温度可以使黄瓜的表皮更快变质。
